title: Quarkus 3.4.1 released - Redis 7.2 and Flyway changes
content: It is our pleasure to announce the release of Quarkus 3.4.1. We skipped 3.4.0 as we needed a fix for CVE-2023-4853 in 3.4 too. Major changes are: Support for Redis 7.2 Adjustments on how to enable/activate Flyway This version also comes with bugfixes, performance improvements and documentation improvements. We currently...
